name: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: salmon fillets, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, black pepper
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat, Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and black pepper in a bowl, Brush the mixture onto the salmon fillets, Grill the salmon for 5-7 minutes on each side, Serve hot with a side of vegetables

name: Fish Tacos
ingredients: tilapia fillets, taco shells, cabbage, sour cream, lime, cilantro, spices
instructions: Season tilapia fillets with spices and grill until cooked through, Warm taco shells in the oven, Shred cabbage and mix with lime juice and cilantro, Fill each taco shell with grilled tilapia, cabbage slaw, and a dollop of sour cream, Serve hot

name: Fish Tacos
ingredients: tilapia fillets, taco shells, cabbage, sour cream, lime, cilantro, spices
instructions: Season tilapia fillets with spices and grill until cooked through, Warm taco shells in the oven, Shred cabbage and mix with lime juice and cilantro, Fill each taco shell with grilled tilapia, cabbage slaw, and a dollop of sour cream, Serve hot

name: Vegetable Curry
ingredients: assorted vegetables, onions, garlic, ginger, spices, coconut milk, tomatoes, cilantro
instructions: Chop assorted vegetables into bite-sized pieces, Saute onions, garlic, and ginger in a pan, Add spices and cook for a minute, Add chopped vegetables, coconut milk, and tomatoes, Simmer until vegetables are cooked through, Garnish with cilantro and serve hot with rice or bread

name: Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, spices, lemon juice, parmesan cheese
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F, Cut cauliflower into florets, Toss the florets with olive oil, spices, and lemon juice, Spread the florets in a single layer on a baking sheet, Roast for 20-25 minutes until tender and golden brown, Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and serve hot

name: Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, spices, lemon juice, parmesan cheese
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F, Cut cauliflower into florets, Toss the florets with olive oil, spices, and lemon juice, Spread the florets in a single layer on a baking sheet, Roast for 20-25 minutes until tender and golden brown, Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and serve hot

name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: chicken, yogurt, spices, tomatoes, cream, butter
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least an hour, Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through, Saute onions and spices in butter, Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft, Add cream and cooked chicken, Simmer until the sauce thickens and chicken is coated with the sauce, Serve hot with rice or naan

name: Vegetable Biryani
ingredients: rice, assorted vegetables, spices, yogurt, raisins, cashews
instructions: Cook rice in a pot with spices and yogurt, Saute assorted vegetables in a pan, Layer the cooked rice and vegetables in a pot, Add raisins and cashews, Cover and cook until the rice is tender and the vegetables are cooked through, Serve hot with raita

name: Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: rice, assorted vegetables, spices, yogurt, raisins, cashews
instructions: Cook rice in a pot with spices and yogurt, Saute assorted vegetables in a pan, Layer the cooked rice and vegetables in a pot, Add raisins and cashews, Cover and cook until the rice is tender and the vegetables are cooked through, Serve hot with raita
